short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A tool for downloading SVG elements by CTRL+ left-clicking them and converting them to .png as well. App logo created using DALL-E.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A tool for downloading SVG elements by CTRL+ left-clicking them and converting them to .png as well. This is handy when working on websites or when trying to rasterize your SVG images quickly.

I use it for converting SVG images for my laser-engraver.

The resulting .png size should be automatically extracted from the SVG - there are no manual resizing options.

App logo created using openAI's DALL-E.
